datasets.name: 1000 Genomes Phase 3 Reanalysis with DRAGEN 3.5 - Data Lakehouse Ready
datasets.description: The 1000 Genomes Project is an international collaboration which has established the most detailed catalogue of human genetic variation, including SNPs, structural variants, and their haplotype context. Phase 3 includes 3202 individuals sequenced and processed with Illumina DRAGEN v3.5.7b. Data available in Parquet/ORC formats for population genetics research.
datasets.license: Data from the 1000 Genomes Project is now available without embargo. Use of the data should be cited as per http://www.internationalgenome.org/faq/how-do-i-cite-1000-genomes-project.

resources.description: Parquet representations of 1000 Genomes VCF outputs from DRAGEN, ready for enrollment into Data Lake as Code.

tutorials.title: Sample Queries on the 1000 Genomes, gnomAD and ClinVar data Lake
tutorials.author: Sujaya Srinivasan

datasets.deprecatedNotice: Amazon is no longer hosting this Data Lakehouse Ready dataset

datasets.name: 1000 Genomes
datasets.description: The 1000 Genomes Project catalogues human genetic variation. Final phase sequenced over 2500 individuals from 26 populations, producing over 80 million variants.
datasets.license: Data from the 1000 Genomes Project is now available without embargo. Use of the data should be cited as per http://www.internationalgenome.org/faq/how-do-i-cite-1000-genomes-project.

publications.title: Exploratory data analysis of genomic datasets using ADAM and Mango with Apache Spark on Amazon EMR
publications.author: Alyssa Marrow

datasets.name: 4D Nucleome (4DN)
datasets.description: The NIH 4D Nucleome program studies the 3D organization of the nucleus in space and time. Data includes genomics and imaging assays on chromatin interactions and nuclear landscape.
datasets.license: External data users may freely download, analyze, and publish results based on any 4DN data provided here without restrictions.

tutorials.title: Using jupyterhub on the 4DN data portal
tutorials.author: 4DN-DCIC

datasets.name: 3DCoMPaT: Composition of Materials on Parts of 3D Things
datasets.description: 3DCoMPaT is a richly annotated large-scale dataset of rendered compositions of materials on parts of thousands of unique 3D models, focusing on stylizing 3D shapes at part-level with compatible materials.

publications.title: 3DCoMPaT: Composition of Materials on Parts of 3D Things
publications.author: Yuchen Li, Ujjwal Upadhyay, Habib Slim, Ahmed Abdelreheem, Arpit Prajapati, Suhail Pothigara, Peter Wonka & Mohamed Elhoseiny

datasets.name: 3000 Rice Genomes Project
datasets.description: The 3000 Rice Genome Project is an international effort to sequence the genomes of 3,024 rice varieties from 89 countries.
datasets.license: This data is available for anyone to use under the terms of the Toronto Statement.

publications.title: Tracking the origin of two genetic components associated with transposable element bursts in domesticated rice
publications.author: Chen J et al (2019)

publications.title: Rice Galaxy: an open resource for plant science
publications.author: Juanillas V et al (2019)

publications.title: Identification and Allele Combination Analysis of Rice Grain Shape-Related Genes by Genome-Wide Association Study
publications.author: Meng B et al (2022)

datasets.name: A region-wide, multi-year set of crop field boundary labels for Africa
datasets.description: Crop field boundaries digitized in Planet imagery collected across Africa between 2017 and 2023, developed by Farmerline, Spatial Collective, and the Agricultural Impacts Research Group at Clark University.

resources.description: Field boundary labels and corresponding Planet images

tutorials.title: Instructions on data access and label-making demonstration notebook
tutorials.author: Lyndon Estes

publications.title: A region-wide, multi-year set of crop field boundary labels for Africa
publications.author: Wussah et al. (2023)

publications.title: Technical report on label develop and processing
publications.author: Wussah et al. (2023)

publications.title: High resolution, annual maps of field boundaries for smallholder-dominated croplands at national scales
publications.author: Estes et al. (2022)

publications.title: A platform for crowdsourcing the creation of representative, accurate landcover maps
publications.author: Estes et al. (2016)

datasets.name: Africa Soil Information Service (AfSIS) Soil Chemistry
datasets.description: Soil infrared spectral data and paired soil property reference measurements for georeferenced soil samples from 19 African countries, collected through the AfSIS project (2009-2018).
datasets.license: ODC Open Database License (ODbL) version 1.0, with attribution to AfSIS

resources.description: Paired wet and dry chemistry measurements for georeferenced soils collected by AfSIS, stored as CSV and OPUS files.

datasets.name: A2D2: Audi Autonomous Driving Dataset
datasets.description: An open multi-sensor dataset for autonomous driving research. Includes semantically segmented images, semantic point clouds, 3D bounding boxes, and unlabelled 360° camera images, lidar, and bus data.
